content.title: Uniform Assistance To SC Students
content.details: Main Objective is to provide economic support and motivation for education. Under this scheme, assistance is given to Students studying in classes 1 to 8. Through this scheme, the Gujarat government promotes primary education.
benefits: Rs.900/- assistance for three pairs of uniforms.
eligibility: The student should be of Scheduled Caste.
Students should be studying in classes 1 to 8.
documents_required: Identity proof: Aadhar card, Voter ID, College ID, etc.
Residence proof: PAN card, Residence certificate, etc.
Bank details e.g. Account number, IFSC, MICR code.

faqs.question: What is Digital Gujarat Scholarship?
faqs.answer: Digital Gujarat scholarship is a broad term that comprises all the scholarships offered by different departments of Government of Gujarat.

faqs.question: What type of Uniform assistance provided to SC students?
faqs.answer: Give Financial Assistance to SC students.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Students from I to VIII will get financial assistance of Rs. 900/-.

faqs.question: What is the Eligibility?
faqs.answer: The student should be of Scheduled Caste. Students should be studying in classes 1 to 8. No Income Limit.

faqs.question: How to apply online for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicants need to access the website Link: Https://Www.Digitalgujarat.Gov.In and follow the procedure.

faqs.question: List of the required documents?
faqs.answer: Identity proof: Aadhar card, Voter ID, College ID, etc. Residence proof: PAN card, Residence certificate, etc. Income proof, Aadhar card, Passport-size photograph, Academics certificates, Bank details e.g. Account number, IFSC, MICR code, Other documents may be required, Caste certificate.

faqs.question: For which category students will be eligible for this scheme?
faqs.answer: All students, who belong to the scheduled caste category.

faqs.question: Which class student will be eligible?
faqs.answer: Students should be studying in classes 1 to 8.

faqs.question: There is any income restriction to apply?
faqs.answer: No, There is no income restriction.

faqs.question: This scheme comes under which state?
